snippet.title: [Subbed] AMNESIA LATER Opening
snippet.description:
Translated by silvermoon249(http://silvermoon249.livejournal.com/32718.html#cutid1)
The first fandisc of AMNESIA, released in 2012 for the PSP in Japan. The game is also released for Vita along with AMNESIA CROWD as AMNESIA LATER×CROWD V Edition and for android. This is V Edition opening, hence why the date shown 2014 instead of 2012. At first, I don't really like this song, but after some time, it grows on me. Enjoy! :D
Song: Hajimari no Kioku(First Memories)
Singer: Oda Kaori
Since no one has translated the opening song for the android version, I'll hold it for now.
